document.full_text: 'we're gonna die' is a bizarre combination of pop concert and autobiographical lament for the human condition, written and performed by young jean lee.
document.title: theater review | 'we're gonna die': amid catchy choruses, personal tales of life's brutal verities
lines_and_colors: 'we're gonna die' is a bizarre combination of pop concert and autobiographical lament for the human condition, written and performed by young jean lee.
